description: In France they might call this a soup a concassée The strawberries are crushed rather than pureed, so the soup has lots of texture Strawberries, like other red fruits and berries, are a great source of anthocyanins and ellagitannens, which have been shown to have antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties.
title: Strawberry Soup Recipe
text:
In France they might call this a soup a concassée. The strawberries are crushed rather than pureed, so the soup has lots of texture. Strawberries, like other red fruits and berries, are a great source of anthocyanins and ellagitannens, which have been shown to have antioxidant and anti-inflammatory properties.
Featured in: The Fruits Of Summer, Sip By Sip.
